Name: Angkor: Runefall
About the game: Save an magical village in this extraordinary Match-3 game! When the sudden catastrophe struck the hidden village of magicians, they turned to the only person in the village capable of using the ancient runes to cast magic: a bright, young, mage apprentice. Can you uncover the secret behind the catastrophe, brave the hidden dangers, save the village, and reach the happy ending?
Meta Title: Angkor: Runefall: Jan 25, 2021, Ironcode and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Angkor: Runefall? Check out the release date (Jan 25, 2021), developer insights from Ironcode, and a complete game summary.
